cell.html: DTSE 1 or 2-man steel cars acquired from the Ottawa Electric Railway. Retired 1958-59. 825 preserved by Seashore Trolley Museum, 829 sold to a Toronto restaurant, front third of 831 bought by OC Transpo in 1985 but scrapped 1999.

Fleet Number(s) Thumbnail Length Year Manufacturer Model Trucks Notes
Streetcar operation continued on from the Ottawa Electric Railway and ran until May 1st, 1959
2001-05 sold to Kitchener Transit in 1959, 2006-10 sold to Toronto Transit Commission in 1959
Fleet Number(s) Thumbnail Year Manufacturer Model Motors Notes
This article relating to Ottawa and to Canada's National Capital Region is a stub . You can help Wikipedia by expanding it .
Trolley Bus operation began December 15, 1951 and ran until June 27, 1959
